name: The 5th Int’l Congress on Psychiatry
content: The 5th Int’l Congress on Psychiatry (CP 2024) will be held during May 31- June 2, 2024, in Kunming, China. The aim of CP is to provide a stage for researchers, engineers, academicians as well as industrial professionals from all over the world to present their research results and development activities in Mental Health, Neuroscience Nursing and Neurosurgery, Stress, Anxiety and Depression, Self-harm and Suicide Prevention. CP 2024 will be a valuable and important platform for inspiring international and interdisciplinary exchange at the forefront of Psychiatry.
